StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateContrac.ngGoal]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int, @FiscalYear int, @MonthCode int, @Contrac.ngMissionType varchar(6), @MissionValue int = 0, @UserLogin varchar(15)
AS BEGIN
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND MONTH_CODE = @MonthCode AND CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE = @Contrac.ngMissionType)
BEGIN
UPDATE CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN SET MISSION_VALUE = @MissionValue, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND MONTH_CODE = @MonthCode AND CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE
BEGIN
INSERT INTO CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN (ORGANIZATION_ID, FISCAL_YEAR, MONTH_CODE,CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE, MISSION_VALUE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@Organiza.onID,@FiscalYear, @MonthCode, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @MissionValue, @UserLogin, GETDATE())
END END
